name: Depopulate
oracle_text: Each player who controls a multicolored creature draws a card. Then destroy all creatures.
flavor_text: No screams rang out. No blood stained the streets. In an instant, the bustling metropolis simply fell silent.

name: Arc Spitter
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has "{1}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature that's blocking it."
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: "I'm fresh out of mercy today. Why don't you ask Sparky here for forgiveness?"

name: Rooftop Nuisance
oracle_text:
Casualty 1 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 1 or greater. When you do, copy this spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.)
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Draw a card.

name: Ceremonial Groundbreaker
flavor_text: Construction in New Capenna is imbued with tradition and ritual.

Double strike

name: "Public Enemy"
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Each creature must attack enchanted creature's controller each combat if able.
When enchanted creature dies, draw a card.

name: Psychic Pickpocket
oracle_text: When Psychic Pickpocket enters the battlefield, it connives. When it connives this way, return up to one target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

name: Shakedown Heavy
oracle_text:
Menace
Whenever Shakedown Heavy attacks, defending player may have you draw a card. If they do, untap Shakedown Heavy and remove it from combat.

name: "Fire Sale"
oracle_text: Players can't gain life this turn. Damage can't be prevented this turn. "Fire Sale" deals 3 damage to any target.

name: Hostile Takeover
oracle_text: Up to one target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn. Up to one other target creature has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn. Then Hostile Takeover deals 3 damage to each creature.

name: Hostile Takeover
oracle_text: Up to one target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn. Up to one other target creature has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn. Then Hostile Takeover deals 3 damage to each creature.
flavor_text: Ob Nixilis smiled. It had been over one thousand years since his last conquest.

name: Vampire Scrivener
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you gain life during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Vampire Scrivener.
Whenever you lose life during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Vampire Scrivener.
flavor_text: No one remains on her list for long.

name: "Hyde the Bodies"
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, "Hyde the Bodies" connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
When "Hyde the Bodies" dies, return another target non-Rogue creature card with power less than or equal to Corpse Cleaner from your graveyard to the battlefield.
